name: Bean Expedition
description:
In this wonderful little game jam game, you control a rover on a planet that is legally distinct from Mars. You are looking for Signs of Life on this planet as you control the rover and complete little platforming sections. 

You might find some beans...

Created for the AOE 2021 Game Jam -- Theme: Signs of Life

Controls -- 

  • ESC - Pause
  • W/S - move forward/back (Also works on Arrow Keys)
  • A/D - turn left/right (Also works on Arrow Keys)
  • SPACE - use your fuel tank to boost upwards and gain some height
  • Mouse - move camera
  • E - Complete game after collecting 10 beans

Asset Citations--

  • Rocket Boost Engine Loop - qubodup - freesound.org
  • Outdoor Ground Textures - A dog's life software - Unity Asset Store
  • Skybox Series Free - Avionx - Unity Asset Store
  • Skuare Font - https://www.1001freefonts.com/skuare.font
